mapper.insert: insert into db_productinfo (SKUID, ITEMID, SKU, SONSKU, CATEGORYID, WEIGHT, ATTRIBUTEID, ATTRIBUTENAME, CREATETIME, MODEFIEDTIME, PRODUCTTYPE) values (#{skuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sku,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sonsku,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{categoryid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{weight,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{attributeid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attributename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modefiedtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{producttype,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update db_productinfo set ITEMID = #{itemid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SKU = #{sku,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SONSKU = #{sonsku,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CATEGORYID = #{categoryid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WEIGHT = #{weight,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ATTRIBUTEID = #{attributeid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTENAME = #{attributename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATETIME = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MODEFIEDTIME = #{modefiedtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PRODUCTTYPE = #{producttype,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where SKUID = #{skuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select SKUID, ITEMID, SKU, SONSKU, CATEGORYID, WEIGHT, ATTRIBUTEID, ATTRIBUTENAME, CREATETIME, MODEFIEDTIME, PRODUCTTYPE from db_productinfo where SKUID = #{skuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select SKUID, ITEMID, SKU, SONSKU, CATEGORYID, WEIGHT, ATTRIBUTEID, ATTRIBUTENAME, CREATETIME, MODEFIEDTIME, PRODUCTTYPE from db_productinfo
